item.title: Refactoring: split loop + loop/map equivalence
item.description: We can combine the “Split loop” refactoring technique plus the “Loop / Map equivalence” when refactoring. Given that it does not matter in which order we apply these operations, we can say that they have the associative property Chart of the operations Take the case of a loop doing two things. From there: we can replace the loop for a map (including the two actions into a single map body) we can split the loop into two loops Take the case of two loops, doing one thing each.
